Package org.spongepowered.api.effect

Interface ForwardingViewer

All Superinterfaces:
Audience, ForwardingAudience, Pointered, Viewer
All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientWorld, ServerWorld, World<W,L>
public interface ForwardingViewer extends Viewer, ForwardingAudience
ForwardingViewer represents some group of Viewers
